TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HideDisabledControlAdapter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter

summary.span: 为关联的 Web 控件提供呈现功能，以修改特定浏览器的默认标记或行为。

span.span: Provides rendering capabilities for the associated Web control to modify the default markup or behavior for a specific browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类改写关联控件来修改默认标记或特定浏览器的行为。The class adapts the associated control to modify the default markup or behavior for a specific browser. 你可以扩展类来进一步自定义呈现控件。You can extend the class to further customize rendering of the control. 适配器是编译接管生命周期的页或控件的一个或多个阶段的.NET Framework 组件。Adapters are compiled .NET Framework components that take over one or more stages in the life cycle of a page or control. 扩展类将提供访问权限的生命周期阶段控件。Extending the class will provide access to the life-cycle stages of the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff). 适配器的初始请求导致要搜索的给定请求的浏览器的特征的控件的映射适配器的.NET Framework。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 使用浏览器定义文件类来标识客户端浏览器的特征并映射到浏览器类型的适配器。Browser definition files are used by the class to identify the characteristics of the client browser and map the adapter to the browser type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff). 有关 ASP.NET 和的分步演练，演示如何实现控件适配器并将其映射到控件的自适应呈现体系结构的说明，请参阅"创作 ASP.NET 服务器控件适配器:: 简介"在MSDN库中[http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).For a description of the adaptive rendering architecture of ASP.NET and a step-by-step walkthrough that shows how to implement a control adapter and map it to a control, see "Authoring ASP.NET Server Control Adapters: An Introduction" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类来显示控件中启用和禁用状态。The following code example shows how to extend the class to display a control in an enabled and disabled state. 此示例包含三个部分：This example contains three parts: - 适配器派生自类。An adapter derived from the class. - 包含在.aspx 文件控件和特定于设备的内容。The .aspx file that incorporates the control and device-specific content. - 要链接到一种设备类型的适配器的浏览器文件。A browser file to link the adapter to a device type. 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/CS/hidedisabledcontrolcontosoadapter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/VB/hidedisabledcontrolcontosoadapter.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何声明具有特定于设备的内容控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declare a control with device-specific content. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/CS/implcs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/VB/implvb.aspx#3)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将链接控件添加到运行在 Windows CE.NET 上的浏览器的自定义适配器。The following code example shows how to link the control to the custom adapter for browsers running on Windows CE .NET.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 构造的实例类。The .NET Framework constructs an instance of the class. 适配器的初始请求导致要搜索的给定请求的浏览器的特征的控件的映射适配器的.NET Framework。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 一次找到，该控件包含对中的映射的适配器实例的引用其属性。Once found, the control holds a reference to the mapped adapter instance in its property. 有关适配器映射和浏览器定义文件的信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。For information on adapter mappings and browser definition files, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub Render (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: override void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 包含可生成和呈现特定于设备的输出的方法的 。

span.span: The containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.

summary.span: 将关联的 Web 控件以 HTML 格式写入到输出流中。

span.span: Writes the associated Web control to the output stream as HTML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将写入关联写入输出流以 html 格式的控件。The method writes the associated control to the output stream as HTML. 默认情况下，.NET Framework 调用在 Web 服务器控件的自己方法。By default, the .NET Framework calls on the Web server control's own method. 但是，一旦设置该控件的属性时，.NET Framework 将执行的适配器的实现优先于关联控件的事件。However, once the property of that control is set, the .NET Framework will execute the adapter's implementation of the event over that of the associated control. 事件用于执行呈现到的设备浏览器的标记代码的修改。The event is used to perform modifications to the markup code that is rendered to a device browser. 在此处完成控件的生命周期和仅实际标记创建的这个阶段之前，应设置控件属性。Control properties should be set prior to this phase of the life cycle and only the actual markup creation for the control done here. 在此阶段的生命周期对控件所做的更改不保存到视图状态。Changes made to the control in this stage of the life cycle are not saved to view state. 保存对控件所做更改，重写事件。For saving changes made to the control, override the event. 事件还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托，委托是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。The event also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法可以传递对用于呈现如果启用了关联的控件的父控件的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to pass the object to the parent control for rendering if the associated control is enabled. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/CS/hidedisabledcontrolcontosoadapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/VB/hidedisabledcontrolcontosoadapter.vb#2)]
